title: The Creative stitch
creator_credit: Jack Joynes and Creative Embroidery Association
brief_description: With so many techniques to explore, a wide variety of materials to be used and so many stitches to be devised, embroidery can be an expressive language. Ideas from nature and painting an be transferred to string embroidery, machine embroidery and other methods of needle weaving.
description: With so many techniques to explore, a wide variety of materials to be used and so many stitches to be devised, embroidery can be an expressive language. Ideas from nature and painting an be transferred to string embroidery, machine embroidery and other methods of needle weaving.
